page.title: 16SANDWICK- GOING TO THE SHOPS
page.content: I interviewed{Miss Mackenzie}about her shopping.Miss Mackenzie shops at {Prestos}and{Woolworth}for food, and at Tommy Nicolsons for her papers and Pat Macfarlane for presents. She uses Kenny Macdonalds for chemistry needs and Charles Macleod for meats and the Grillburger for froozen foods.She uses these shops because they are quite conveniant and also because they are well supplied and frozen foods are handy. She has access to car parks from the shops and that is good because she needs to buy a lot as it has to last a week.
